title: Happy Anniversary at the Amalfi
text: We stayed one night at the Amalfi to celebrate our anniversary. Hotel lobby is very minimalist, easy check-in. Room is small but has nice touches...books on shelf, CDs, nice roomy bathroom and loved the double-headed shower and Aveda products. Bed was comfy. Continental breakfast was very nice, croissants, muffins, breads, fruit, etc. We would stay there again.
